Abilities.Name: Basic Attack
Abilities.Description: The Hero slashes the enemy with his sword.

Abilities.Name: Ranged Attack
Abilities.Description: The Hero shoots the enemy with his bow.

Abilities.Name: Power Shot
Abilities.Description: The Hero uses a great amount of strength to draw the bow, unleashing a powerful arrow.

Effects.Name: Power Shot Mastery
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .1 to the Strength Factor of this ability

Effects.Name: Draw Power
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds 10 to the Stamina Cost of this ability

Effects.Name: Draw Power
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability adds .2 to the Range of this ability

Abilities.Name: Endurance
Abilities.Description: The Hero's weathered body is more resistant to punishment.

Effects.Name: Durable
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases his health by 10 percent

Abilities.Name: Light Footed
Abilities.Description: The Hero's agility allows him to move more often.

Effects.Name: Agile
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability decreases his initiative by 5 percent

Abilities.Name: Sprinter
Abilities.Description: The Hero's natural speed allows him to move further.

Effects.Name: Usain Bolt
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases his movement by 1

Abilities.Name: Athletic
Abilities.Description: The Hero's intense training allows him to recover stamina faster.

Effects.Name: Marathon Man
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases his stamina regen by 5%

Abilities.Name: Desperate Assault
Abilities.Description: The Hero unleashes a flurry of blows using all his energy.

Effects.Name: Every Ounce
Effects.Description: Every point of stamina consumed by this ability adds .01 to the Strength Factor of this ability

Effects.Name: Every Ounce
Effects.Description: Drains all of the Hero's Stamina

Effects.Name: 100% Muscle
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the effect of Every Ounce

Abilities.Name: Precision
Abilities.Description: The Hero puts extra effort into making sure his arrows find their mark.

Effects.Name: One Shot, One Kill
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Strength Factor on his Bow attacks by 5%

Effects.Name: Aiming Isn't Easy
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Stamina Cost on his Bow attacks by 5%

Abilities.Name: Flame Strike
Abilities.Description: The Hero imbues his sword with fiery magic and strikes his enemy.

Effects.Name: Blazing It Up
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the Magic Factor of this ability by .1

Effects.Name: Need More Fuel
Effects.Description: Every Level the Hero has in this ability increases the MP cost of this ability by 2
